main.toolTipHeader: Stretchly - The break time reminder app
main.warning: This will restore app defaults and all your settings will be lost.

settings.openAtLogin: Start Stretchly automatically when logging in
settings.monitorIdleTime: Monitor system idle time (breaks are paused if system is idle).
settings.monitorDnd: Show breaks even in Do Not Disturb mode

schedule.miniBreaksInfo: Mini Breaks are short breaks taken regularly to give you a chance to stretch and relax.
schedule.showNotificationBeforeMiniBreak: Show notification before Mini Break starts
schedule.longBreaksInfo: Long Breaks are taken less regularly, but are of greater duration, allowing you to take an extended break from your work.
schedule.showNotificationBeforeLongBreak: Show notification before Long Break starts
schedule.strictModeInfo: Strict Mode prevents you from skipping either Mini Breaks or Long Breaks and is designed to help discipline.
schedule.enableStrictMini: Enable Strict Mode for Mini Breaks
schedule.enableStrictLong: Enable Strict Mode for Long Breaks
schedule.cantDisableBoth: It is not possible to disable both types of breaks

about.learnMore: To learn more about Stretchly features, view a tutorial, download the latest version or contact us for support,
about.designedBy: Icon and UI design by Colin Shanley

heart.desc1: Taking regular breaks when using a computer is scientifically proven to be important for your physical and mental well-being.
heart.desc2: Stretchly is free. But you can lend your support by donating and help us continue to improve Stretchly and release other free software.

contributorPreferences.title: Advanced Preferences
contributorPreferences.notificationsInfo: System notification shown before breaks to let you prepare for it.
contributorPreferences.newVersionNotification: Notify when new version is available
contributorPreferences.customIdeasInfo: Allows you to use custom break ideas by editing configuration file. (For advanced users.)
contributorPreferences.useIdeasFromSettings: Use break ideas from configuration file
contributorPreferences.breakPostponeInfo: If enabled in main Preferences, you can postpone breaks. Following settings allow you to specify when, for how long and how many times you can postpone a break.
contributorPreferences.pauseUntilMorningInfo: Specify till what hour 'Pause until morning' should pause.
contributorPreferences.showWelcomeWindow: Show Welcome window on next start
contributorPreferences.opacityInfo: How solid should the break window be?
contributorPreferences.breakWindowSizeInfo: What percentage of the screen should the break window hide?
contributorPreferences.miniBreakStartSound: Play end-of-break sound also at the start of Mini break
contributorPreferences.longBreakStartSound: Play end-of-break sound also at the start of Long break
contributorPreferences.naturalBreaksInfo: If monitoring of idle time is enabled in main Preferences, you can specify after what time the breaks should be paused.
